mapper.insert: insert into board (writer,subject, content, pw, reg_date, re_group, re_step, re_depth, ip) values(#{writer},#{subject},#{content},#{pw},NOW(),#{re_group},#{re_step},#{re_depth},#{ip})
mapper.select: select * from board order by re_group desc, re_step asc limit #{start}, #{cnt}
mapper.update: update board set hit=hit+1 where num=#{num}
